short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Add a cute 3D companion that hangs out in your browser with you!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Foryus are cute 3D companions that hang out in your browser (similar to 2D shimejis, which were popular back in the day).

Foryus are cute characters you can play with in your browser (inspired by the old 2D Shimeji companions). Drag them around, throw them, or just simply watch them vibe!

Upload your VRM models to create your own Foryus. We'll generate a 4-letter code you can share with anyone that wants to download it.

Talk to us in our Discord: https://discord.gg/Y8XmWXGT
